Feature.Name: Everbright Lantern
Feature.Text: An everbright lantern provides clear illumination in a 60-foot cone and shadowy illumination in a 120-foot cone, just like a mundane bullseye lantern, but its flame never goes out.

MagicProperty.Name: Everbright Lantern
MagicProperty.Description: An erverbright lantern contains an Eberron dragonshard imbued witht eh effect of a continual light spell. This bright light is mounted inside a normal bullseye lantern, allowing the light to be shuttered off. An everbright lantern provides clear illumination in a 60-foot cone and shadowy illumination in a 120-foot cone, just like a mundane bullseye lantern, but its flame never goes out.
